name: Virgin Peruvian Hair- Natural Straight
description:
We are extremely proud to introduce our new premium line of hair:

Peruvian Virgin hair.
This hair is 100% pure virgin hair, making it of great unmatched quality when compared to other type of hair. This is one of the best we have as it is the one that will last the longest.

The reason why is because the Peruvian hair texture is rare, ensuring supreme quality.

This hair is considered a luxury product because of the difficulty to obtain it. It is very soft, shiny and beautifully curled for Body Wave and Curly hair extensions.

This Peruvian Virgin hair is very versatile: this means that it can blend-in quite undetected with your own hair or used on its own in a fully closed weave.

A lot of people ask us why we chose to offer Peruvian Hair Extensions and the answer is simple - we simply want 'the best'. We are constantly looking for hair that stands out quality wise and this Virgin Peruivan Hair was a must!

This 100% human hair is in its virgin form
(natural dark color 1b), making it easy to color without degrading the quality of the hair.

-4 oz each bundle
-Comes from one donor, not mixed
-100% unprocessed virgin temple hair
-Reinforced wefts
-Machine-made wefts
-Tangle free
-Healthy shine
-Endless styling options
-All cuticles are in the same direction
-Hair starts completely virgin in natural colors ( #1B )

Note: 2-3 bundles are needed for a full head of hair depending on the length and desired volume.

PLEASE NOTE: WEFTS ARE NOT PRE SEALED

name: EdgeStick™- Black
description: The EdgeStick™ is the #1 root and edge control touch‐up tool for women with textured hair. Its usefulness, function, and ease of use, earn it the privilege of being an essential hair styling tool for maintaining smooth edges between salon visits. The dual protective combs feature closely‐placed teeth that allow effortless hairline straightening. Because the combs are not the heat source, unlike a pressing comb, the EdgeStick may be used closer to the skin than a flat iron – and will not burn the skin.

name: Virgin Lace Frontal- Body Wave
description:
Our lace frontal is perfect for women who wear hair weaves or have hair loss in the crown area( male pattern hairloss). It is also perfect for alopecia as it is very natural looking. It gives you the option to part your hair anywhere you wish and if you are wearing a weave, you have a natural parting and a great way to give your hair a break from relaxers. With a lace frontal you do not need to worry about blending in your own hair or anyone seeing the tracks of your hair weave. Well, lets be real, nothing looks worse on a hair weave than everyone seeing the weave tracks. Well, issue is 100% solved, get a lace frontal and you will enjoy your hair weave more. Furthermore, you can wear your lace frontal multiple times. 


Features:
Hair Type: 100% Virgin Hair
Hair Color: Natural Color (1B, 2)
Hair Density: Light to Medium (100 to 110%)
Cap Construction: All Swiss Lace with little stretch from ear to ear
Bleached Knots: No
Length: Available in 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 22 inches
Lace Color: Light Brown
Can Be Curled or Flat Ironed: Yes
Head measurements: Free size. Fits all head sizes.

name: Virgin Chinese: Straight
description:
Chinese hair is known for its sleek manageability and strength. It's slightly coarser than other Asian hair and the hair follicles are thicker. Chinese hair is sleek and manageable without having a shiny doll hair look. Thicker follicles than Malaysian and Indian hair. Coarse. Low luster. Excellent match for African Americans. Consistent quality. Chinese hair ranges in color from off black to dark brown.
 Does not swell of frizz in humidity. 
PROS: Like Malaysian hair, it is very well behaved. It doesn’t pouf or puff the way Indian hair does after a while. It’s relative coarseness and thicker follicle make it an excellent match for African American wearers. Extremely strong hair. Can be processed from virgin near black to platinum blond. The only hair type that can withstand extreme processing without degrading the hair quality.

name: Wild Tresses for Luxe Virgin Hair: Custom Full Wigs w/ closure
description:
We are proud to introduce our Full Wigs with your choice of either a lace closure or a silk base closure. 
You can throw those wig caps away and never have to worry about someone getting too close to your scalp again. 
Our Full Wigs are made with our Luxe Virgin Hair closures so we know your unit will go undetected. 
Our Full Wigs are very versatile, they can be put in a high bun or even a high ponytail. 


Our Full Wigs are available in your FAVORITE Luxe Virgin Hair texture, length and style. Just purchase your hair, add the custom unit service to your current order and your new look will arrive at your door.


PRICING IS BASED UPON 3 BUNDLES OF HAIR w/ CLOSURE. PLEASE SELECT THE ADDITIONAL BUNDLES YOU WILL BE ADDING TO YOUR CUSTOM UNIT IF MORE THEN 3 BUNDLES.



How To Order Your Custom Unit:

*Choose the Luxe Virgin Hair & closure you would like your unit made with by placing those items in your cart first.
*Measure your head using the UPART& FULL UNITS FAQ's to determine your cap size.
*Choose your cap size from your measurements
*EACH UNIT IS HANDMADE WITH 3 BUNDLES AND A CLOSURE HAIR IS NOT INCLUDED (any extra bundles will need to be added to your purchase)
*Units are handmade and custom to you. Please note it takes 7-10 days to construct your unit and 1-3 days for shipping. 
*All units will come deep conditioned.

We will email you to confirm your order before it goes into production, if you would like a phone call please leave your number under "note to seller" and someone from our office will contact you to discuss your order.

name: Bleach My Knots Doll (lace closures)
description:
What are bleached knots?

-When hair is tied to the lace base, there is a dark knot where the hair is secured. Bleaching or "lightening" the knots reduces the visibility of this knot. On off black (1B) and dark brown hair, the knots are lightened to a light brown shade. Very light brown and BLONDE lace closures usually do not need bleached knots. 

PLEASE NOTE: We offer KNOT BLEACHING SERVICE to lighten the knots on our Luxe Virgin Hair lace closure. Overprocessing the knots on the entire unit leads to premature, and sometimes excessive, shedding because the bleached knots are weaker. We therefore lighten the knots just a few shades and we do NOT offer "super bleached knots".

**Two extra  days will be added to the timeframe of your order**

name: Virgin Filipino- Natural Wave
description:
Our Virgin Filipino hair is imported directly from the Philippines and has been hand selected.  Our Virgin Filipino hair is free of any processing. This hair is 100% virgin with the cuticles intact. The strands are thick and slightly coarse with a healthy shine. 

This hair is very easy to maintain and is able to hold a curl nicely. Our hair can be curled or worn bone straight for a sleek look. 

Filipino hair is thicker than Indian Hair, Brazilian hair, and even Malaysian hair thus being able to withstand color, heat, and manipulation without jeopardizing quality.

This hair comes in natural black. Each bundle is 4 oz. 
Two bundles are recommended for lengths shorter than 18 inches. We recommend at least 3 bundles for lengths longer than 18 inches.

WEFTS ARE NOT SEALED

name: Virgin Cambodian-Loose Wave
description:
Virgin Cambodian Hair is truly one of the most expensive hair's on the market. It blends well with any hair texture and can be worn wavy (air dry for maximum body), curly by using a curling iron, or straight when flat ironed. 

The hair is naturally light, full and bouncy and is cut from a single donor's head & sewn in the same direction the hair naturally grows to preserve the actual wave pattern. With proper care and maintenance, the Cambodian hair will remain silky and luxurious and will not mat, shed or tangle overtime. 

Like all of our virgin hair, this gorgeous hair has not been mixed with synthetic hair fibers or hair from different origins. Hair is double drawn with cuticles intact to prevent tangling and shedding problems that are common in low quality non-remy hair.

description:
We are extremely proud to introduce our new premium line of hair:

Peruvian Virgin hair.
This hair is 100% pure virgin hair, making it of great unmatched quality when compared to other type of hair. This is one of the best we have as it is the one that will last the longest.

name: EdgeStick™- Pink
description:
The secret to getting sleek edges and super smooth roots is easier than you think. Though most of us don’t have a glam squad at our fingertips, EdgeStick™ allows you to get professional results at an affordable cost. The tool, manufactured to work like a mini pressing comb, combines heat resistant guide combs and a center rod coated with ceramic and tourmaline.
 
The tool comes in handy for women looking to blend their natural or chemically-treated hair with weaves. The crown or hairline is the most sensitive part of a woman’s mane and is typically more susceptible to damage from over-processing and routine heat-styling. However, straight edges are essential to flaunting fabulous silky extensions, making EdgeStick™ a healthier and more convenient option.
 
The perks of using this travel-friendly gizmo are burn-free fingertips and the ease of grazing your roots without damaging your scalp. Many celebrity stylists tout the EdgeStick™ as a must have for their clientele because of its effectiveness in quickly straightening edges within one pass.  
 
When wearing weaves, leaving your roots out gives you a more natural look. Though the texture and shine of these faux pieces rarely changes, your edges are exposed to inclement weather and sweaty workouts, which makes it nearly impossible to maintain a sleek look sans heat. EdgeStick™ is also useful for transitioners who are currently wearing extensions to grow out their natural hair. Smoothing curly hair can sometimes be a feat, but the tool, which offers precise adjustable heat control (200°F - 450°F), perfectly manages unruly edges.

FEATURES:
Dual protective guide/styling combs 	
Ceramic, tourmaline coated barrel 
TruTempTM digital heat control 	
Ergonomically designed
Compact 	
Swivel cord 
Convenient heat resistant carrying case o	Heat increments of 10°F, with range of 200°F to 450°F

BENEFITS:
Straightens edges closest to the roots with NO BURNS! 
Enhanced ion output, contributes to shiny hair 
Heats rapidly, maintains precise temp with memory heat setting feature 
Grips comfortably for enhanced styling experience 	
Requires minimal work station space 
Remains tangle‐free during use at any angle or position 
Allows discrete, protective storage, and carry 
Provides precision heat control for use on all hair types, textures as well as chemically‐
treated, color‐treated and natural hair – regardless of the condition of the hair.

name: Virgin Mongolian Hair- Straight
description:
Mongolian hair is the perfect hair type for anyone who wants to add volume to medium/fine hair. It has a medium density feel to the hair, its slightly thicker than Malaysian hair so if Malaysian is too fine for you, then choose Mongolian. It comes in straight, wavy, bodywave and curly.  All South East Asian hair (Chinese, Mongolian, Malaysian) is light in density and will work well with most European hair types.
 
If you are not of European heritage and would like a completely different look with your extensions, then Malaysian or Mongolian is the way to go - beautifully fine, straight hair on an African/Caribbean woman will set trends. We dare you to try it!
